channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 04:29 Alarm lifted in Kirovohrad region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 04:29 Alarm lifted in Kirovohrad region. Follow further messages. #Kirovohrad_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
